name: typedoc-plugin-include-example
description: Typedoc plugin to include files as example
author: Thomas Riffard (https://github.com/ferdodo)

scripts.build: vitest run && stryker run && tsc && tsc --project vitest.tsconfig.json && tsc --project typedoc.tsconfig.json && typedoc --treatWarningsAsErrors --tsconfig ./typedoc.tsconfig.json --plugin . demo/index.ts && playwright test && dprint check
